function NPC_8895002:Init(NPCID) NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2); NPC_8895002.UD_Pain = 1 NPC_8895002.UD_PhasePain = 2 NPC_8895002.TALENT_HornDash = 190001 -- 뿔 들고 유저가 쓰는 탤런트 NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainHornDash = 210500230 -- 뿔에 맞으면 쓰는 탤런트 NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainHead = 210500213 NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainBreakHorn = 210500214 NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainFaint = 210500215 NPC_8895002.MODE_Flying = 1 NPC_8895002.BPARTS_Horn = 1 NPC_8895002.LIMIT_Pain = 2000 NPC_8895002.LIMIT_BParts = NPC_8895002.MaxHP * 0.3 end
function NPC_8895002:ProcessHitBody( ThisNPC, HitInfo)
local currentTalent = ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() if currentTalent == 210500214 or currentTalent == 210500215 or currentTalent == 210500213 or currentTalent == NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainHornDash then return HitInfo end
if HitInfo.TalentID == NPC_8895002.TALENT_HornDash then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(NPC_8895002.TALENT_PainHornDash) return HitInfo end
local totalDamage = ThisNPC:GetUserData(NPC_8895002.UD_Pain) + HitInfo.Damage if totalDamage < NPC_8895002.LIMIT_Pain then ThisNPC:SetUserData(NPC_8895002.UD_Pain, totalDamage) return HitInfo end
-- 아파하기 ThisNPC:SetUserData(NPC_8895002.UD_Pain, 0) local phasePain = ThisNPC:GetUserData(NPC_8895002.UD_PhasePain) + 1 -- Pain 횟수 ThisNPC:SetUserData(2, phasePain)
ThisNPC:ClearJob() if phasePain % 4 == 0 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210500215) else ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210500213) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_8895002:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo)
if (not ThisNPC:CheckBPart(NPC_8895002.BPARTS_Horn)) and ThisNPC:GetHP() < NPC_8895002.LIMIT_BParts then ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart(NPC_8895002.BPARTS_Horn, HitInfo.Attacker) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210500223)
return HitInfo end
return NPC_8895002:ProcessHitBody( ThisNPC, HitInfo) end
function Sorena_Stressed2(ThisNPC, Opponent) if ThisNPC:GetMode() ~= 0 then return end
-- 거리가 10m보다 멀면, 타겟을 근접으로 바꾼다. local Distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo(Opponent) -- ThisNPC:Say("-- [DEBUG] 거리는 "..tostring(Distance).."입니다.")
if(Distance >= 1000) then ThisNPC:Aggro("short", 0) return end
-- 거리가 가까우면 랜덤으로 셋 중 하나의 근접기술을 사용한다.(2개는 근접, 한개는 그냥 날아가기) local ranNum = math.random(0, 2)
if(ranNum == 0) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210500206) -- 콤보 elseif(ranNum == 1) then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf(210500207) -- 흙뿌리기 end end
function NPC_8895002:OnHitCapsule_1_1(HitInfo) return NPC_8895002:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_8895002:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_8895002:ProcessHitBody( this, HitInfo ) end
